headline: Intellia Focuses on Pipeline Development Amid Stiff Competition
summary: Studies on NTLA's gene-edited therapy, nex-z, are progressing well while other pipelines are picking up pace. Stiff competition in the target market is a woe.

headline: Vertex halts development of diabetes cell therapy after trial failure
summary: Vertex continues to develop type 1 diabetes therapy, zimislecel, which is being investigated in a Phase III trial.
